alert.note: Alert for Henry; Jefferson; Keokuk; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 7:44PM CDT until June 21 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Henry County in southeastern Iowa... Southeastern Keokuk County in southeastern Iowa... Washington County in southeastern Iowa... Jefferson County in southeastern Iowa... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Keota to near Batavia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fairfield, Washington, Wayland, Brighton, Richland, Ainsworth, Batavia, Libertyville, Lockridge, Maharishi Vedic City, Packwood, Pleasant Plain, Coppock, Abingdon, Keota, Ollie, West Chester, Washington Airport, Glasgow and Germanville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
